Name: RC SIM 2022
About the game: Welcome to the Multi-map World of RC Fun! -Select from different types of remote control vehicles -Play around in a sandbox style environment -Fly, Drive, and Sail! Features: *multiple maps *multiple vehicles and objects *destruction in future releases *Possible Multiplayer support upcoming *character and vehicle controls independent! *more... Upcoming map editing as well as full controller support coming in the future! Screenshots of demo only until maps are created!
